portfolio.title: Note Keeper
portfolio.description: Dynamic note keeping application created using React hooks to post notes to a list which is displayed on a board.

portfolio.title: Decentralized Finance App
portfolio.description: Decentralized finance application implemented through Motoko that demonstrates the effect of compound interest.

portfolio.title: Path Finder
portfolio.description: Path finding algorithm designed to find the shortest path between a designated start and end point. Uses A* Search through Python to dictate which route to traverse.

portfolio.title: Blog Website
portfolio.description: Blog style website created through using JavaScript along with Express and Mongoose to dynamically create and add posts to the main page of the website.

portfolio.title: Connect4 AI
portfolio.description: AI created to play a perfect game of Connect4 in any scenario using the Mini-Max algorithm along with alpha-beta pruning to aid in informing the AI's next move.

portfolio.title: Tindog
portfolio.description: Mock landing page created for a website designed to help your dog find the love of their life. Created using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

portfolio.title: Cube Slider
portfolio.description: Game created using Unity and C# where the objective is to slide a cube left and right to avoid the procedurally generated objects for as long as possible.
